Movies TV Info - SPA

#ReactJs #ReduxJs #API #SPA #JavaScript

A single page application (SPA) to search for a movie/TV show details. The application build with ReactJs (Modern JavaScript library) and ReduxJs to manage the app states and with external API (OMDB) to fetch the search text data.

Preview GitHub

INSPIRE Template Design

#HTML #CSS #Bootstrap #jQuery

A single-page template for a start-up company website, used basic HTML tags with CSS (Bootstrap library), JavaScript jQuery library for functionality, and Font Awesome library for font icons.
